name: AWS RDS Instance
description: Monitor the observability of specific [AWS RDS Instance](https://aws.amazon.com/rds/).

METRIST_AWSRDSPERSISTENT_ADDRESS.description: IP address or domain name of your RDS instance.

METRIST_AWSRDSPERSISTENT_ENGINE.description: Use 'postgres' or 'mysql'. If undefined, the monitor will default to mysql. [Contact us to support other engines.](https://metrist.io/contact/)

METRIST_AWSRDSPERSISTENT_PORT.description: Port number to access your database.

steps.description: This step attemps to ping your postgres or mysql RDS instance.
